basics.name: Daniel Kozlowski
basics.label: Technologist
basics.summary: A tenured technologist with a proven record of solid design and reliable deployment

work.summary: Led the Engineering department as Director of Engineering
highlights: Helped grow team from start up through billion valuation
Managed team of sixty developers and forty contractors
Provided technical leadership across entire NMS product
Oversaw multiple major product release cycles from inception to deployment
Designed and implemented multiple new collection technologies for NMS
Contributed to improved of scaleable clustered data collection platform
Optimized data storage and retrieval components of NMS system

work.summary: Design, deployed, and maintained computer control systems for US Warships
highlights: Developed custom overlay OS for Siemens 400 series PLC's
Implemented GUI interface library for control of PLC from PC workstation
Design of land based simulation and testing laboratory

awards.name: NSWCCD Command Award
awards.summary: Awarded for excellence in support of the Fleet

publications.name: Redundancy in General Purpose Software Configured Control System for Critical Ship Systems
publications.summary: Method and design of redundant software configured control systems to allow enhanced reliability under failure conditions
